class.name: SkaldEngine
class.brief_description: Runs the Skald narrative scripting engine.
class.description: Wraps the Skald narrative engine as a Godot node. Load a [code].ska[/code] script, then call [method start] to begin execution. Each method returns a response object ([SkaldContent], [SkaldQuery], [SkaldExit], [SkaldGoModule], [SkaldEnd], or [SkaldError]).

method.name: load
method.description: Loads a Skald script file from the given path.

method.name: start
method.description: Starts execution from the beginning. Returns the first response.

method.name: start_at
method.description: Starts execution at the given tag. Returns the first response.

method.name: act
method.description: Advances the script. Pass [param choice_index] to select a dialogue option. Returns the next response.

method.name: get_current
method.description: Returns the most recent response without advancing.

method.name: answer
method.description: Provides a value in response to a [SkaldQuery]. Returns the next response.
